page.title: 09RECREATION IN RINGSTEAD
page.content: In the main,recreation in the village is of simple pleasures.There is a play ground for the children with swings and a slide and a rough football pitch At the Gin Trap Inn,Petanque and Darts are played.At the village hall Whist Drives are held and there is a Bowling Green. Horse Riding,walking along the ancient Peddar's Way and gardening are also favourite pastimes. Personal transport is needed to Hunstanton for Swimming and Squash and for Birdwatching on the coast which is famous for the variety of both resident and migrant birds.
